instructions: Set approved: true on any entry to have gmail_engine.py send it on next run. Review everything before approving.

grants.name: Mozilla Foundation Democracy x AI Cohort 2026
why_you_qualify: Working open source technology (AGPL-3.0, live on GitHub)
AI that serves democratic/humanitarian values not corporate ones
Autonomous idea generation = algorithmic accountability in reverse
Open by design, forkable for any cause
Zero-cost architecture = accessible to Global Majority builders
grants.what_to_say: The Meeko Nerve Center is an autonomous humanitarian AI that monitors Congressional stock trades, generates Palestine solidarity content, funds Palestinian children through art sales, and can be forked by anyone for $5. It runs entirely on free-tier GitHub Actions with zero monthly cost. It is the opposite of extractive AI — it gives power back to individuals and causes.
grants.note: DO THIS FIRST. 17 days left. This is $50k minimum.

grants.name: Tech for Palestine Incubator
why_you_qualify: Directly advocates for Palestine via Gaza Rose art + PCRF donations
Open source tool that others can fork for Palestine causes
AI that counters algorithmic suppression of Palestinian content
Self-replicating = scales to thousands of projects
70% of art revenue to PCRF = direct financial impact
grants.what_to_say: Gaza Rose is an open-source autonomous AI system that generates Palestine solidarity art, sells it, and sends 70% directly to PCRF. It also monitors Congressional stock trades, surfaces free Palestinian books and music, and can be forked by any advocate for $5. We want to join T4P to connect with the ecosystem, get mentorship on scaling impact, and contribute our fork-model to other T4P projects.
grants.note: Rolling admission. Apply this week. This gets you into the T4P ecosystem which is where your real community is.

grants.name: Mozilla Foundation Fellows Program 2026
why_you_qualify: Auditing AI systems (Congress watcher = algorithmic accountability)
Protecting user privacy (zero-tracking architecture, privacy scrubber)
MENA region relevance (Gaza Rose, Palestine focus)
grants.what_to_say: Building open-source autonomous AI for humanitarian causes. Zero tracking, privacy-first architecture. Forkable by anyone globally for any cause.
grants.note: Good backup to the Incubator cohort. Apply after T4P and Mozilla Incubator.
